content.detailedDescription: While going to get my oldest daughter at school, my youngest daughter was in the back seat.  she was only a little over two years old, and we had been working on teaching her shapes.  all of a sudden, she said, "look mom, triangle."  i said, "where at baby?"  then she pointed up in the sky.  i looked and saw a metallic triangle just hanging in midair over a grocery store. we watched it as i drove for over a mile and it never moved.  during the second mile, we had turned away from it and then there were trees and buildings in the way of our view.  when i drove back home about 20 minutes later, it was gone.  over the next couple of months we saw a couple of cylinder shaped crafts in the sky in daylight while the kids were playing in the backyard.  and then one night during that same summer, my husband was working and the kids were in bed.  i laid down and had a strange feeling something was over my house.  as quick as i thought it, the bedroom filled with a strange orange light.  i closed my eyes absolutely scared to death to open them, afraid of what i might see.  then symbols went across my eyelids, like hieroglyphics.  i just prayed that it would stop and go away.  after a few minutes, it did.  i know this sounds crazy and that's why i have waited so long to report it, but i would be happy to take a lie detector test.  i know what happened, and my daughter still remembers seeing it.
content.summary: Hovering triangle

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo flashes red and yellow ligths  movement going up side down.
fist we saw a brigth red ligth and then turned yellow ..And was descending
content.summary: The ufo flashes red and yellow ligths  movement going up side down.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my yard and heard low rumble, i looked up into southern sky and saw group of 5 lights heading from south to north.  i am guessing the object may have been one mile in the sky. object was southeast of me so i could not use the western sunset or moon to see outline of object.  i was waiting to hear the regular jumbo jet sound but object was much quieter but had low rumble whole way.  it took about one minute to fly from where i first noticed it until i lost sight of it going north toward st. louis.  i live 80 miles south of st. louis.

this is first time i ever seen anything like this.  i have seen many large and small jets.  i have never seen or heard a stealth bomber, but if i had to categorize it i would think that it would sound and look like that.

feelings were excitement and wonder.  like i said i have never seen anything like it before.  if it happened to be a stealth bomber it was still a neat experience.
content.summary: Group of 5 lights, one was strobe light , broad arrow formation, going from south to north toward st. louis , low rumble sound

content.detailedDescription:
Hot glowing lights in formation then making triangle and one by one flying south then turning east and disappearing. not particularly fast except after the turn

this is the second time i have witnessed the. previously near ohio turnpike on i77 about 1 month ago. exact same thing.
content.summary: Ufos sited in ohio

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday (8/11/13) morning around 4:30, i was out with my girlfriend between pahrump and las vegas watching the meteor shower. she had fallen asleep and i observed what appeared at first to be a dim star near the seven sisters star cluster. from my position, i was looking back to the east/southeast. i noticed that the light was moving and it appeared to be higher than planes fly, although being dark, it's hard to know for sure. the light appeared to fly in a roughly southerly direction until i could no longer see it due to the mountains. the light began quite dim, then disappeared. when it reappeared, it was substantially brighter than it's original luminosity. then, it went dark again. the cycle of dark, dim, dark, bright was visible to me for roughly 1.5 to 2 minutes; each phase of the cycle took approximately 2-3 seconds. the light appeared white in color.

chances are, especially in nv, what i saw was a plane, but it appeared much higher than any i've seen before. i have no formal aviation training but have lived in the flight path of mccarran airport 8 years and am fairly familiar with their various entry and exit routes, given the wind, weather etc. this object appeared not only higher than expected but also appeared to be headed in a direction that i don't think i've seen before, however it is possible that being roughly 30 miles west of my house skewed my perspective. i also notice that there never seem to be flights originating from mccarran that early. perhaps it was just an international flight or some other one going somewhere quite far away. one thing i've noticed about planes even flying very high is that one can usually see one or both flashing lights on the wings which have a fairly frequent flash time/cycle. this object definitely had a much slower flash cycle, and i've never seen a plane that flashes with different luminosity each time, nor have i ever seen a plane go dark for several seconds as part of the light flash cycle.
content.summary: Intermitent flashing lights of varying brightness

content.detailedDescription:
Over the past two years i have seen this same object at various times of the morning and night fly the same course, south to north from directly overhead of my location to approx 30deg. above the eastern horizon.

during this sighting, i noticed that the object at one point became noticeably brighter for about three to four seconds. i believe this to be due to the "craft" being exposed to the sun. with the time and location it should be possible to estimate the altitude.

i have seen several space objects over the years starting with skylab and its nose cone to shuttle sightings and the iss. this object moved at a speed consistent with a space born object.

its course was smooth and perfectly straight. there were no navigation lights or any other lights other than the brightness of a bright star. except for the 3 to 4 second period where the object became brighter the the brightness and color where consistent.
content.summary: High altitude object traveling south to north

content.detailedDescription: i was on my way to work headed south from tularosa to alamogordo, new mexico.  at the time i was working at the radio shack in the white sands mall.  so it must have been around 12:00 pm.  usually i take us 70/54 but decided to take the rail road access road just because it was a change of pace.  the road is a slow road 50-mph max.  i spotted a black object that at i first thought was a water tank. the kind that supplies water to cities and i wondered when they had put up a tank.  but then i realized it was too high in the air and it had no support structure.  i would say the object was between 80 to 200 feet off the ground, moving slowly north to south approximately 30 to 50 mph.  it was probably somewhere between highway 70/54 and holoman afb property line.  i thought it might be a balloon, but if it was it was a very ridged structure. i saw no rotation, and could not make out any detail other than it was black and had a configuration like a water tank.  i followed it almost all the way into alamogordo when it began to descend, it landed in a grove of trees beyond what is called the la luz gate that lets employees onto holoman afb.  the access gate was locked so i was unable to get any closer than that.  when it landed i noticed a blue airforce pick up drive towards it.  i was unable to see much more because it disappeared behind the trees so i could not see any kind of recovery crew. the object descended slowly in the manner of a hot air balloon but with much finer control.  its controllability was not erratic at any time, nor did it act as a balloon would act.  prevailing winds are from southwest to northeast so it would have been going directly against the wind.  i saw no emergency vehicles or any indication of what was happening was unexpected.  my assumption however unusual the sighting was and it still is my assumption that it was some kind of experiment conducted by the air force.  i have never see an object like it before or since.  but to be honest i haven���t been looking.  i couldn���t tell you if it made noise because it was too far away ��� to no more than a mile away and i had (old car lots of noise) car engine noise.  when i stopped at the la luz gate and watched it land i didn���t hear any noise, but at that point it was still a good ��� mile away.  winds would have been such that the sound would have not carried to me unless it was extremely loud.  my times and dates may be off by a lot because i am trying to remember something that happened several years back.  i have 22 years experience in the airforce as an aircraft mechanic, and i am aware of most but not all aircraft configurations.  slow steady direction, no visible changes or erratic movement.  flight level was constant until it reached la luz gate then it did controlled and easy decent.   if i had held my arm out i could have covered the object with the end of a pencil eraser. i would say judging by the trees it went behind it was 25 to 30 feet wide and about the same tall.
content.summary: Thought it was a water tank then realized it was moving

content.altitude: Landed, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Many objects being seen, daylight and night time. several witnesses to contact for information. one witness describing an infiltration of some type for the area. humans in white outfits seen. also a large group of humans seen in black clothing, in some type of formation. rotating ship seen on side of hill. object that looked like truck, with no one in it, sped off at extreme speed from stand still on rugged terrain. tree manipulations. need camera with scope here asap. one possible cattle mutilation- with many pictures. unidentified's coming down, and shooting up into atmosphere.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Cone,   Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Various witness testimony of activity between city creek and trail creek. on going every night and day. in hills and in sky. researcher needed in area.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work, driving on interstate 40, traveling west into the city of winston-salem. i was about 3-5 miles from the outskirts of the city when i noticed the craft. it was early morning (right after 5am) and the sky was dark, the sun had not yet come up.
i notice a hovering black triangle near one of those towers that have blinking lights (could have been a cell tower or an electrical tower, i'm not sure). it was locate to the north of my position. it slowly started traveling to the south, the path took it nearly over my location but not quite.
as it passed in front of my location (over interstate 40) i saw that it was indeed a black triangle object with steady white lights underneath and red lights that blinked. i also noticed that it was very huge - about the size of a large house. it was very low to the ground and traveled slowly.
i lost sight of it as i continued driving and it became lost to sight beyond the tree-line to the south of my location. 
it made no noise at all.
content.summary: As it approached me i became aware of how huge it actually was. it was a triangle, black in color with solid white lights and a few red lights that blinked.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside, may 6 2013, between 5:30 and 6:30 pm, in my backyard having a smoke. my daughter was jumping on the trampoline. the wife was out. happened to look off to the sw, over the houses across the street. and there it was. a round, metal, reflective, sphere with what seemed to be an antenna on the top and bottom, the antenna were small and thin. i watched it fly over my street, over my trees and out of sight. i had tried to get my phone out to get a picture, but couldn't do it quickly enough. i stood there, leaning on my fence, for a good 5 minutes, pondering what i had just bore witness to. my daughter was preoccupied with the trampoline and did not see it. it made no sound at all. i think it was about 3-6 ft. in diameter. it was moving about as fast as a helicopter would. the elevation did not seem to change. i later recorded the date, and approximate time. it's not a huge sighting or anything, but it's going to bother me forever, if i don't mention it. i went on youtube, to see if i could find something similar. i typed " shiny metal ball shaped ufo ", and was surprised to find similar spheres on video. not a lot though. i would say 2-4. it seems one of these was found in south america, and another was recorded in the u.S. this object struck me as a drone of some sort. i thought balloon, but its path was intentional and much too stable to be a balloon. also, the wind was all but nonexistent. i was kind of surprised, but very calm. it was only in my line of sight for 30 seconds or less, and the trajectory was consistent. it flew in a straight line. this is the first "ufo" i have witnessed. i have also witnessed extensive amounts of upper stratospheric geoengineering over our skies in the past 5 months all over my city. i drive for a living, and i see them all the time. these "persistent contrails"/"chemtrails", spread put and cover our skies with a sickening white haze of particulates. investigation of these, in my opinion is a far greater use of time.
content.summary: Shiny, aluminum, colored orb about 1-200 feet up, flew above and over and out of sight behind my trees.

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice and sunny day approximately 1:30 p.M . i was driving when a dark flying object in the clear blue sky caught my attention. the object was flying at top-tree level from southwest to northeast slowly descending .It was like a black balloon while shining as result of sunlight ,it was pulsing green light from inside . i was driving at 45 k.M so the whole event took place in about 1 min to 1.5 min right in front of my eyes. eventually i lost sight of the object while it was flying over airports fences at very low altitude.(trudeau airport).
content.summary: It was descending and flying from southwest to northeast then flied over the airport fence .

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch in kernersville, nc at appox. 7:45pm on the 14th of august 2013. i noticed 2 very bright, glowing solid object traveling rather fast from the southwest. i observed them moving roughly together in the same direction (roughly towards the east-northeast). my attention was drawn to them because of the bright, somewhat glowing yellow color that stood out against the blue sky. i thought that maybe they were airplanes at first but the airplanes that i noticed earlier and later (after the event) did not 'glow' from the sun like you notice that they sometimes do. also this 'glow' was very different than an airplane catching the light of the sun - it was constant and steady and there were no 'wings' that you would notice on an airplane. i lost sight of the objects as they passed behind my home then the tree-line. they were 'bullet or missile' shaped and i could not tell how high in the sky they were or how big they actually would be.
content.summary: There were 2, roughly going in the same direction. they both glowed a shiny bright yellow, were 'missile' shaped, quiet and high in the sky. traveling rather fast.

content.detailedDescription: We were on vacation in south padre.It was just after the fourth of july.We were stayin at the laquinta hotel.It was me,my son,and son in law.We were lookin for crabs on the beach around 3:00am.It was july 6 2011,my wife and daughter were asleep in their rooms and we thought it would be a good time to get our flashlights and go huntin for crabs.We were not the only people out lookin.We met a man who was staying at the hotel next to us,he was a lawyer from fort worth,texas.He to was huntin crabs.Any way we got to talkin bout where we were from and offered him a beer.We stayed talkin for a while,around 3:20am we noticed we were the only people still on the beach and we decided to pull up our chairs on the deck by the beach.We were talkin and i noticed a bright light farout on the ocean and i asked them did yall just see that bright light,then i noticed something come out off the water,we kept talkin,then i asked them is that a helicopter,or an airplane off in the distance,icouldnt tell,all of a sudden it got closer and we all agreed it was not a plane or helicopter,the top of the craft was blinkin white it hovered over the water,then slowly took off,then the top of the craft turned red,it took off and made a uturn back towards us,stopped in mid air and lights flashed across its front,yellow,red blue,green.Several times.We just looked at each other and again i asked them are yall seeing what im seeing.And we all agreed that what we were looking at was not anything that we have ever seen.It did this fir approx.20 to 30 min.Everytime it would stop over the water it flashed colors across the front in front of us, we said to each other its like they know were here starring at it.We didnt move or speak for a while.It took off across the sky then made a complete stop and shot straight up over some stars came back then slowly down and took off towards the ocean.The man we meet that nite,the lawyer,said he has done work for lochead and martin.He said he has seen jets,planes,etc.,but that we do not have anything in our military that can make those kinds of turns or just shoot up vertically and that fast.He said he didnt believe in ufos,but that next day he called everyone he knew to tell them what we had just witnessed.We ran back to our rooms woke up our wives to tell them what we just saw,that nite didnt sleep at all.I am now 100% believer and so is our friend from fort worth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stayed quiet and couldnt believe what we just saw

content.detailedDescription: I was looking into the sky in the mountains by my house in mt. baldy, california, roughly around 11 p.M. and the skies were clear.  i noticed a bright bluish light i thought was a star.  the more i looked at it i noticed it was bigger than any other stars in the sky.  then i looked to the right of the object and saw the same size object with a redish orange color.  both objects came in towards each other in a straight line, no noise.  the sky light up with a huge flash and both objects switched positions and took off at light speed, silently.  i am convinced this was not of human origin, impossible at the speed and how fast these objects moved.  after the sighting i am absolutely convinced that it was something not of this world.  the objects seemed to collide then the sky lit up and they shot off into the distance at an incredibly fast speed until they disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two objects, one blue the other orange red..  came in towards eachother, the sky lit up, they switched positions and took off at an incredibly fast rate.

content.detailedDescription: Came outside motorhome for smoke and i noticed a chinesse lantern type flame about500ft away, about over the boatramp of lake. no boats are allowed on lake after dark and it was a clear night, i watched it hover for several minutes about ten feet above lake, it started to rise slowly and as it got to about 25ft above water the flame started to look fuzzy, as it rose to about 50ft, it started to change shape, and it began to turn and as it did, i noticed a red strobe on oneside and green on other.It very slowly made a turn and then i noticed it was a triangle shaped craft, dull black in color.. it began to move towards me and just floated away, prolly 50ft over me and 50ft away from me and dissapeared. not a sound from it.. i called 911 to report it and the officer they sent, took a report but thought i was nuts, im sure. i took two photos of it with a throw away camera, one was nothing but the negitive of other shows it perfectly!!! didnt show up on photo though.. i still have negitive but im afraid to try to develop it.. i saw a u.F.O and im not crazy!!! im a retired firefighter and an x public safety officer, and it was a life changing event for me. i could have hit it with a rock, it was so close..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was on camping trip

content.detailedDescription: I was looking into the sky in the mountains by my house in mt. baldy, california, roughly around 11 p.M. and the skies were clear.  i noticed a bright bluish light i thought was a star.  the more i looked at it i noticed it was bigger than any other stars in the sky.  then i looked to the right of the object and saw the same size object with a redish orange color.  both objects came in towards each other in a straight line, no noise.  the sky light up with a huge flash and both objects switched positions and took off at light speed, silently.  i am convinced this was not of human origin, impossible at the speed and how fast these objects moved.  after the sighting i am absolutely convinced that it was something not of this world.  the objects seemed to collide then the sky lit up and they shot off into the distance at an incredibly fast speed until they disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two objects, one blue the other orange red..  came in towards eachother, the sky lit up, they switched positions and took off at an incredibly fast rate.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the back patio, looking up at the stars.  saw what i thought might be an egret but as i watched it, it descended from a very high altitude coming almost straight down.  it kept getting larger and larger and as i watched, it started leveling off and made a slow sweeping pullup and leveled off at about 300 to 500 feet, possibly lower, and flew straight away from me towards the southeast without a sound.  the object appeared to be a 3d boomerang, and 100 to 200 feet across. as it flew away, no sound and it did not have an apparent cockpit.  offwhite in color and lumps throughout the expanse that reminded me very much of the "michelin man". 
i didn't feel anything unusual except that i could not imagine what i had just seen.  no anxiety, fear, dread, nothing out of the usual.
lost sight when the object got out a little and was below the horizon.

this location is on the sw corner of tinker afb, do thought it might be a b-2 landing but no way, they make noise.  had i had a number to call the tower at tinker, i would have just to verify if they had seen anything or not.
content.summary: Straight overhead, descended to about 300 to 500 ft,. leveled and flew off to the se

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot outside my apt. looking for meteors.  i was looking directly up at zenith when i noticed a small light grom much brighter (blue-wht) quickly (2 seconds).  it then dimmed by 1/2 immediately changel location (about an inch of sky to the nw). it then came to a stop again and then quickly started moving again (1-2secs) to the n. as it did it became dimmer and dimmer and had disappeared after moving about 3 inches of dky to the norther. keep in mind it had to be high, i thought it was a satellite  at first until after the sighting when i said to my girlfriend...Duh satellites to stop. when it dimmed and disappeared it seemed to me that it dimmed b/c it was getting higher and higher in alt, not that the light source dimmed or that it had headed far enough n at a constant alt. i was not really excited by it i came inside a reported it too my girlfriend. oddly enough this is the 2nd sighting i have had this year..Reported one 7/4/13 in about the same location. it was the motion of this object going from still to moving in a blink and finally seemed to ascend as it headed n disappearing after only covering about 3 inches of sky (although it was at an apparent high altitude)
content.summary: The ufo appeared was high, thought it was a satellite but it was still. immediately becae very bright, then dimmed as it quickly changed positio then headed north

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from the convenient store i went to get my girlfriend a gatorade and as i was driving south i notice four rectangular lights moving over this factory called ridg u rak in north east pa. i pulled over and called my girlfriend to tell her to run out to the driveway and look east...I got out of my jeep and i was watching the formation one of the lights blinked out then came back on and then three of the lights blinked out and the one light started moving. i continued to go home after the sighting. when i got home we stood in the driveway and watched the one light. we got into my jeep and drove up to a secluded bridge where you can see for miles and also see over lake erie and there was nothing left to see.... i do not know what i saw that night but i do want to know if anyone has had any similar experience.
content.summary: Saw four solid lights in rectangle formation move, stop, then....

content.detailedDescription:
At 2030 on 8-15-13 my wife & i were watching tv on our front three season
porch. when my wife looked up and said what the heck is that. we ran outdoors and watched this bright red-orange oval object just under cloud cover traveling at a rate of speed i would estimate to be relevant to our space station. it was traveling nw to ne in a straight line and visible for a full 5.5 minutes until it disappeared in the distance. had this object been much higher we would have thought it to be a satellite, with refection from the sun which had recently set. this object was way to low and moving way too fast & eerily quiet....
content.summary: Red-orange oval object traveling nw to ne at a high rate of speed with no discernable sound or propulsion noise.

content.detailedDescription: Object was not observed when picture was taken. it was later discovered while reviewing the photos. the picture was taken in an aircraft at 47,000 feet over brazil, about 100 miles north of rio de janeiro. i was the pilot of the airplane.
content.summary: None
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
this incident occurred on saturday august 10th at 10:05pm. i was walking my dog down the road i live on checking out the big dipper, when i noticed a light in the southwest sky moving. i stepped off the road so i could watch it approach. it seems a lot of aircraft fly with their landing lights on. i noticed no lights were blinking, which was unusual. as it approached i could see it was pulsating red, and seemed to be changing shape. it flew directly over my head to the northeast. i cant estimate its height, except to say it was not a real high like the aircraft that leave trails behind them. after flying overhead it went below the tree line to the northeast.
   after this i looked around the sky and noticed a distant aircraft in the far west with its usual lights blinking. looking to the southwest i spotted another light like before and it took the exact same flight. that was number two pulsating red orb. this happened two more times. thats a total of four orbs in less than ten minutes. i really dont know what to think of all this.
content.summary: Four pulsating red orbs headed northeast, one after another.

content.detailedDescription: On 8/14/13 at around 9pm i was taking garbage out at work. i looked up at the sky and saw a bright rose/pink light very slowly moving northwest above cloud level. it slowly dimmed as it was moving. at first i thought it was a satellite but after it dimmed completely out, i could make out a dark colored craft. the craft had no lights it was about the size of a grain of rice held at arms length but shaped more like a triangle. it slowly disappeared in the distance above the clouds.
content.summary: Pink/rose bright light. slowly dimmed then saw craft with no lights

content.detailedDescription:
At roughly 00:12 on august 15th 2003 i was driving west down counce rd. toward mississippi hwy. 3 when i slowed down to see if i could pinpoint an odd sound coming from my truck. i rolled the window down to listen for the sound then sped up to see if acceleration had any effect on the noise. about thirty to forty-five seconds of driving at about 20mph a coyote ran out in front of the truck crossing counce rd. headed north causing me to stop. i watched the coyote run down the embankment and into a field. he stopped directly next to a telephone pole. as i was still stopped looking at the coyote i noticed a light that at first i believed was connected to the pole. about 35 to 40 degrees above the horizon i saw three bright semi-pulsating lights in a triangular formation. 

my first thought was they were helicopters in a tight formation. then i considered airplanes taking off from the memphis airport. i've lived in memphis most of my life and am very familiar with the take off/landing patterns of planes as fedex has their main hub there. this time of night was about right for the first inbound flights of the night. i leaned over to the passenger side window and looked back east and could see planes lined up for landing in the distance...Their front main white and red blinking tail and wing lights small but clearly visible. i looked back to the lights still hoovering in the same position and considered that perhaps it was a cellphone tower that was not too far away. i looked east again and spotted the tower blinking red.

at this point i started driving again 20-30mph only taking my eyes off the lights for a few seconds to keep the truck on the road. this is the delta, and farms are everywhere. there were no obstruction to my visibility and the lights were situated perfectly above one of the fields. i was trying to figure out the distance when what i think was a helicopter passed between the two lower light in a downward angled path, that's when i realized they were either huge, or huge and farther away as the helicopter seemed like only a red blinking speck.

by this time i had reached the intersection of counce rd. and ms hwy 3. my view was obstructed for a second or two as i turned right on to hwy.3. i considered trying to take video but figured it would look like every other dark and blurry night shots i'd ever seen. instead i called my friend...It was exactly 00:14. right when she answered the bottom right light shot quickly away to the east and stopped...Pulsated different colors for a short time...Three seconds at most then began to slowly move east until it completely disappeared. it reminded me of someone turning off a flashlight. 

the top and bottom left lights remained in position until i reached the intersection of hwy 3 and old mississippi 304/713 when the top light began to slowly pulsate as the first but did not accelerate, instead it appeared to move slowly north or northeast and disappeared as the first did.

only the bottom left light remained. it did not move. it remained stationary and pulsated as the other two then slowly dimmed and disappeared. i ended the conversation with my friend, and said i'd be back shortly.

last night was perfectly clear and cool, odd for mid-august in mississippi, so the humidity was low as was the haze. it almost felt like fall.

before i returned home i made a loop re-driving my route. at 00:42 i stopped the truck again on counce rd., but this time got out. there were still planes lined up for landing, but realized that where i had seen the lights were well southeast of the airport. they were perfectly framed by a horizon of trees, cropland, and stars above.

"i can't f**king believe this!" was on continuous replay in my head, and apparently vocally as well. as my friend related after i returned home "you kept repeating their formation, movements, and the pulsating white, blue, and green lights...And 'i can't f**king believe this'.

i attached two sketches and a photo for what they're worth. clearly, for some reason i omitted the pole in both sketches. 
1855 - i did this morning
1856 - was done after i returned home last night.
6884 - pic i took this afternoon of location. cell phone tower is in middle
       right above trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three bright spheres in triangle formation hoovering above horizon. slowly moved apart while one remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription: Object descended from ne at high altitude at an extreme rate of speed, stopped temporarily then ascended to the nw with the same extreme velocity. it left a greenish coloured trail.
content.summary: Object descended from high altitude at an extreme rate of speed, stopped temporarily then ascended with the same extreme velocity.

content.detailedDescription: i seen two that night i was smoking a cigarrete outside when i looked up i seen a red glow object slowly disappered  maybe thirty minutes later there was anotherone going ne slowly had pulsating red and clear lights no sound wasent a plane or helecopter what was it you tell me i also have it on viedo please i need somebody to look it im going crazy
content.summary: Seen red glow at first then changed colors red pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30 we were looking for meteors over the ocean at belmar nj when noticed a flashing light coming from a motionless object to the north. it did not move for 30 minutes. object flashed from white to green to red. we watched till finally it decended. thought maybe it was a baloon or kite with some sort of lights attached. have found online others have seen the same object.
content.summary: On the beach looking for meteors when observed a motionless flashing object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
The object was first spotted when leaving the motorway at cossonay by car. the object was hovering in what seemed like circles. the two witnesses were first surprised by the sheer size of the object (pretty big considering the distance) and the fact that it could change both direction and color (from black [20% of the time] to reflective)

the object was followed for about 30 minutes from cossonay to vufflens-la-ville. when we left vufflens-la-ville, the object could not be found any longer in a 5 min timespan, at which point we stopped looking for it.
content.summary: Cigar shape black and reflecting object, howering over vufflens-la-ville (ch)

content.detailedDescription: 08/14/2013 i was standing outside in the driveway on the phone with a friend.  it was approximately around 10p.M.Ish. i noticed a beam of light coming from behind the house up in the sky.  it was moving somewhat slowly then was out of sight.  it was a bright white/yellowish light beaming across the sky the it just remained  still in a straight line. didn't move or anything.  i thought it was the strangest thing i had ever seen.  i told my friend on the phone go outside check it out.  so, she did and didn't see it. i said it's directly above my head in a straight line up in the sky.  i kept saying what is that and where is coming from?  she couldn't see it and then she got off the phone with me. i kept staring at the light trying to figure out what it was and where it was coming from.  i thought for a second maybe its a meteror shower still but then again they said it was on the 12th and 13th. i tried to take a picture from my cell phone and it was just blurred light. so, i deleted it and tried take it again.  still wouldn't turn out.  so, i gave up.  then i went inside when i came back outside about 5mins later it was gone.  like it disappeared.
content.summary: I was standing outside in the driveway talking on the phone with a friend when i noticed a beam of light moving somewhat slowly across the sky.  it was big thick line going straight across.  then just stayed there in the sky for about 10mins
